project_descr: MOT is aiming at developing sustainable transport systems and improving road safety. The project addresses two activity fields: (i) Strengthening governance through NTS reporting and review, and (ii) Capacity building for road and transport safety.

outputs.output_descr: Technical assistance to the Ministry of Transport to support the implementation of the National Transport Strategy and Intelligent Transport System.
outputs.crs_descr: Public sector policy and administrative management
